resources.string: Password and confirmation password do not match
Password must be at least 8 characters
Please enter a valid email address
All fields is required and cannot be empty

string-array.name: onboarding_description
string-array.item: I can provide you with some general information about the news, but please note that as an AI model, I dont have access to real-time data or the ability to browse the internet

News is disseminated through mass media channels such as television, radio, newspapers, and magazines. These traditional media outlets have a wide reach and can convey information to a large audience.
To get the latest live news, I recommend checking reliable news sources such as news websites, television news channels, or radio stations.
These sources offer comprehensive daily news coverage across various topics, including politics, business, world news, sports, entertainment, and more.
